properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the trail to be created, which must be unique for an account.

properties.name: event_rw
properties.description: (Optional) Indicates whether the event is a read or a write event. Valid values: Read, Write, and All. Default value: Write.

properties.name: oss_bucket_name
properties.description: (Required) The OSS bucket to which the trail delivers logs. Ensure that this is an existing OSS bucket.

properties.name: role_name
properties.description: (Required) The RAM role in ActionTrail permitted by the user.

properties.name: oss_key_prefix
properties.description: (Optional) The prefix of the specified OSS bucket name. This parameter can be left empty.

properties.name: sls_project_arn
properties.description: (Optional) The unique ARN of the Log Service project.

properties.name: sls_write_role_arn
properties.description: (Optional) The unique ARN of the Log Service role.
NOTE: sls_project_arn and sls_write_role_arn should be set or not set at the same time when actiontrail delivers logs.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) ID of the ALIKAFKA Instance that owns the groups.

properties.name: consumer_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) ID of the consumer group. The length cannot exceed 64 characters..
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of your Kafka instance. The length should between 3 and 64 characters.

properties.name: topic_quota
properties.description: (Required) The max num of topic can be create of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: disk_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The disk type of the instance. 0: efficient cloud disk , 1: SSD.

properties.name: disk_size
properties.description: (Required) The disk size of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: deploy_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The deploy type of the instance. Currently only support two deploy type, 4: eip/vpc instance, 5: vpc instance.

properties.name: io_max
properties.description: (Required) The max value of io of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: eip_max
properties.description: (Optional) The max bandwidth of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of attaching vswitch to instance.
NOTE: Arguments io_max, disk_size, topic_quota, eip_max should follow the following constraints.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) InstanceId of your Kafka resource, the topic will create in this instance.

properties.name: topic
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of the topic. Two topics on a single instance cannot have the same name. The length cannot exceed 64 characters.

properties.name: local_topic
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether the topic is localTopic or not.

properties.name: compact_topic
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether the topic is compactTopic or not. Compact topic must be a localTopic.

properties.name: partition_num
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The number of partitions of the topic. The number should between 1 and 48.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) This attribute is a concise description of topic. The length cannot exceed 64.
